business_definition: Program Communication Block for PADFL database access. Group item containing database control information and status fields for IMS database operations.
Database Definition name identifying the IMS database being accessed.
Segment level indicator showing the hierarchical level of the current segment in the database structure.
Program Communication Block status code indicating the result of the last database operation.
Processing options defining the types of operations (Get, Insert, Replace, Delete) allowed for this PCB.
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
Segment name identifying the current or target segment type in the database hierarchy.
Key feedback name length indicator. (USAGE COMP)
Number of sensitive segments defined for this PCB. (USAGE COMP)
Key feedback area containing the concatenated key of the current segment position in the database.
